name: Boo-Balu
description:
I am locked, between four walls... Many walls! 

I don't see the exit, I can't even see where I enter, I don't know how I got to this place or why I'm here...

The only thing that I know is that I must collect them all, maybe this way, somehow, I can find a way out.

I see that I am not alone, I am scared, they look like tissue ... or are they ghosts? is that a flan? I better not make contact with them...

 I hope I can resist. 

I am very nervous

I wish I had gum...

♥

  • 10 levels ...
  • Avoid touching the ghosts, catch the gum and run to the portal to escape! 
  • Read the README.txt!
